page.title: 03FOLESHILL FESTIVAL
page.content: {by Aseem Hashmi aged 10.}Every year all the primary schools do a festival in the Foleshill and Little Heath area. Sometimes there are bands playing and the schools dress up as characters from stories or sometimes the children dance on lorries or do fashion shows. People call the festival a carnival. The traffic is usually stopped. A lot of people stand at the side to watch the carnival go by.Usually after the carnival there is a big fair in the park. This festival always happens in the summer.I have been involved in this festival in the year of 1983. Our school was acting as the characters from the story Anansi and the Jar of Bees. I was a bee in that festival. For half of the time I walked it and for the other half I sat on the float. There will be a Foleshill Festival on June 22nd 1985.
